<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_n4776qSrI81rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=Sundiver&channel=matoroignika&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&chapter_id=4081389"></object><br/>"Here Comes the Sun," indeed. Meet <strong><a class="channelname" href="http://www.twitch.tv/matoroignika/profile">MatoroIgnika</a></strong>. He’s the newest member of <a href="http://bit.ly/1knMaSg"><strong>KSP-TV</strong></a>. In this sample clip, watch as he “wins” <em><strong>Kerbal Space Program</strong></em>. Yes, wins.</p>

<p><em>"But wait, you can’t actually win, can you?"</em></p>

<p>I don’t know about you, but we call the finale of this video a win in our estimation. Hope you’ll think so, too.</p>

Dude. That is to great. Okay so he launched a kerbal so hard he left Kerbin's SOI in the opposite direction of his current orbit!

Edited April 18, 2014 by Avera9eJoe
How in the world did Sendred survive that impact? Even Jebediah's spacesuit would have pancaked under that kind of force.

Gents, I give you the power that is my Kannon Rocket - 2 Large. 32 KR-2Ls stashed into one neat package. And boy does it pack a punch. c;

Edited April 22, 2014 by MatoroIgnika

LOL (10 char) Edited April 18, 2014 by Espresso
Grammars N' Stuff
Wow. he just nullified kerbin's SOLAR orbital velocity with a cannon. Danny would be proud.
haha that was hilarious. I wonder how many Gs he pulled getting flung like that
This just shows how AWESOME us BIONICLE Fans are.
Kerbal-Kannons have a long long tradition in the Kerbal Space Program
